taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section alleghenienses;species abbrevians;

treatment.description: a low plant of upland Vt. with fewer glands and nearly terete slender canes, the leaves described as either velutinous or glabrous beneath, is presumably a mixture of no. 164 and some other species.
